thread.title: X-Men's Famke Janssen passes the Jean Grey torch to Sophie Turner: 'We emailed each other, she'll do great' - Movies
thread.title_full: X-Men's Famke Janssen passes the Jean Grey torch to Sophie Turner: 'We emailed each other, she'll do great' - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Tom Eames
title: X-Men's Famke Janssen passes the Jean Grey torch to Sophie Turner: 'We emailed each other, she'll do great' - Movies
text: Â© 20th Century Fox / Everett / REX Unless you're Hugh Jackman, each of the original X-Men movie stars are getting used to the idea of new upstarts playing younger versions of themselves.But original Jean Grey actress Famke Janssen is excited to see what Game of Thrones' Sophie Turner does with the character in the upcoming X-Men: Apocalypse. And she has also directly given Turner her seal of approval.She told Digital Spy: "She emailed me and so we had a nice little exchange and she was very complimentary and asking for tips, but she's such a talented young actress she doesn't need any help from me."I'm sure she's doing just great on her own. I'm looking forward to seeing what she's done with Jean." X-Men Apocalypse: Everything you need to know including cast, spoilers, trailer, release date and moreBut could we ever see Janssen return to the franchise eventually, like her brief cameo at the end of Days of Future Past? Possibly."The younger version is now there, so I may just be too old to play myself! But Ian McKellen and Patrick Stewart have been doing it for years and years and with their younger selves, so maybe if a female could do it too, I'd like it to be Jean Grey."Turner will take on the role alongside several other younger versions of X-Men heroes in Apocalypse, which will be released in UK cinemas on May 19, 2016 and in the US on May 27, 2016. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4121752337001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14121752337001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4121752337001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4121752337001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14121752337001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4121752337001.init(); ai_type="video"; } After landing the role, Turner said of her predecessor: "She was amazing. So, I'm really trying to emulate her, because she did such a great job and I just hope I do justice to this incredible character."Janssen starred as Jean Grey in the first three X-Men movies, and was brought back to life after the events of Days of Future Past, along with her partner Cyclops (James Marsden).The actress currently stars in ABC series How to Get Away with Murder, which returns on Wednesday, October 28 at 9pm on Universal Channel in the UK.
